title: Authors and Citation
text: Jaimie Harbin. Maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: c, role=c("aut") cfe, comment=c)) (2024). MarConsNetData: Get data sampling efforts MPAs. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://dfo-mar-mpas.github.io/MarConsNetData/, https://github.com/dfo-mar-mpas/MarConsNetData.
code: @Manual{,   title = {MarConsNetData: Get data for sampling efforts in MPAs},   author = {{c} and comment=c),person(given="Remi", family="Daigle", email="remi.daigle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca", role=c("aut") and {comment=c))}},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://dfo-mar-mpas.github.io/MarConsNetData/},   url = {https://github.com/dfo-mar-mpas/MarConsNetData}, }

what: Get data for sampling efforts in MPAs
title: Get data for sampling efforts in MPAs
text: goal MarConsNetData facilitate acquisition data Maritimes Conservation Network

title: Get data for sampling efforts in MPAs
text: can install development version MarConsNetData GitHub :

title: Get data for sampling efforts in MPAs
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(MarConsNetData)  bioregion <- data_bioregion() #> Warning in CPL_crs_from_input(x): GDAL Message 1: +init=epsg:XXXX syntax is #> deprecated. It might return a CRS with a non-EPSG compliant axis order.

what: A Package for Locating and Transforming MPA Data — MarConsNetData-package
title: A Package for Locating and Transforming MPA Data — MarConsNetData-package
text: MarConsNetData package locate transform real data collected variety different Marine Protected Areas (MPAs).

what: A look up table for data — dataTable
title: A look up table for data — dataTable
text: data frame includes ids associated data projects Project Planning Tool package ability access. addition ids, table titles can used either projects PPT associated id PPT. addition, get_functions column identifying sub function used obtain data. Lastly, source column identifies data internal Department Fisheries Oceans Canada (DFO) external.

title: A look up table for data — dataTable
code: library(MarConsNetData) data(dataTable) head(dataTable,5) #>     id             title              get_function        package   source #> 1 1093    snowCrabSurvey    project_snowCrabSurvey MarConsNetData internal #> 2  642 eDNAMetabarcoding project_eDNAMetabarcoding MarConsNetData internal #> 3 1491    optimizingeDNA    project_optimizingeDNA MarConsNetData internal #> 4  428       argoProgram                  getIndex     argoFloats internal

what: Get Canadian Protected and Conserved Areas Database — data_CPCAD_areas
title: Get Canadian Protected and Conserved Areas Database — data_CPCAD_areas
text: function gets polygons Canadian protected conserved areas specified bio region. information visit https://www.canada.ca/en/environment-climate-change/services/ national-wildlife-areas/protected-conserved-areas-database.html

title: Get Canadian Protected and Conserved Areas Database — data_CPCAD_areas
Get Canadian Protected and Conserved Areas Database — data_CPCAD_areas
text: bioregion sf data.frame bio region. can use MarConsNetData::get_bioregion() download bio region choice. zones logical indicates zones returned (TRUE) , default, unioned (FALSE). zones FALSE, sf data.frame grouped NAME_E geoms unioned resulting complete loss columns.

title: Get Canadian Protected and Conserved Areas Database — data_CPCAD_areas
text: "sf" "dataframe" object

title: Get Canadian Protected and Conserved Areas Database — data_CPCAD_areas
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ bioregion <- data_bioregion() MPAs <- data_CPCAD_areas(bioregion,  zones = FALSE) } # }

Get climate data — data_PAVICS
text: Get data PAVICS THREDDS catalog

title: Get climate data — data_PAVICS
code: data_PAVICS(   OPENDAP_url =     "https://pavics.ouranos.ca/twitcher/ows/proxy/thredds/dodsC/datasets/simulations/RCM-CMIP6/CORDEX/NAM-12/day/NAM-12_NorESM2-MM_historical_r1i1p1f1_OURANOS_CRCM5_v1-r1_day_19500101-20141231.ncml",   first_date = "1950-01-01",   end_date = "1951-01-1",   variable = "tas",   geom = data_planning_areas(),   maskGeom = TRUE )

title: Get climate data — data_PAVICS
text: OPENDAP_url character string OPENDAP url THREDDS catalog. Defaults RCM-CMIP6 daily simulation first_date character string first date included data subset. Defaults "1950-01-01" end_date character string last date included data subset. Defaults "1950-01-01" variable character string variable query data. Defaults "tas" Near-Surface Air Temperature. See OPENDAP url options geom sf data.frame used limit spatial extent data subset (via bounding box). Defaults Scotian Shelf Bay Fundy planning area maskGeom logical defaults TRUE turn values outside geom NA instead returning values downloaded .

title: Get climate data — data_PAVICS
text: matrix

title: Get climate data — data_PAVICS
code: require(MarConsNetData) ssbof <- data_planning_areas() #> Warning: GDAL Message 1: +init=epsg:XXXX syntax is deprecated. It might return a CRS with a non-EPSG compliant axis order. climate <- data_PAVICS image(apply(climate,c(1,2),mean)) #> Error in apply(climate, c(1, 2), mean): dim(X) must have a positive length

what: Get data for the Marine Protected Area App — get_project_data
title: Get data for the Marine Protected Area App — get_project_data
text: function obtains information required analysis Marine Protect Areas (MPAs).

title: Get data for the Marine Protected Area App — get_project_data
code: get_project_data(ids = NULL, titles = NULL, taxize = FALSE, MPA = NULL)

title: Get data for the Marine Protected Area App — get_project_data
text: ids single vector ids project(s) associated Project Planning Tool (PPT) titles character indicating name project. See table vignette details. taxize Boolean indicating data frame names categorized subphylum. FALSE species names given. Note subphylum "Vertabrae" class given instead MPA name MPA Atlantic Canada. Options include BancDesAmericains, basinHead, eastport, gilbertBay, gully, laurentianChannel, musquashEstuary, stAnnsBank. NULL data plotted

title: Get data for the Marine Protected Area App — get_project_data
text: dataframe

title: Get data for the Marine Protected Area App — get_project_data
text: Jaimie Harbin Remi Daigle

title: Get data for the Marine Protected Area App — get_project_data

Get data for AZMP (579) — project_AZMP
text: season character vector either fall spring. fall given data fall program returned. spring given CTD data spring program returned. summer winter given, CTD ground fish data given respective season. destdir directory indicating save fetched data. force boolean indicating new version data obtained

title: Get data for AZMP (579) — project_AZMP
